00035 /** Utility printing function. */
00036 void printColumnVector(ColumnVector &v, std::ostream *out, const std::string& delim) {
00037   int nRow = v.Nrows();
00038   int i = 0;
00039   if(out == NULL) 
00040     out = &cout;
00041   for(i = 0; i < nRow - 1; i++)
00042     (*out) << v.element(i) << delim;
00043   (*out) << v.element(i);
00044 }
00045 
00046 std::string stringColumnVector(ColumnVector &v, const std::string& delim)
00047 {
00048   std::ostringstream ostm;
00049   printColumnVector(v,&ostm,delim);
00050   return ostm.str();
00051 }

00053 ////
00054 //// Matrix
00055 ////
00056 
00057 /** Mutilply each element individually and return matrix. */
00058 Matrix elementMultiplication(Matrix &x, Matrix &y) {
00059   assert(x.Nrows() == y.Nrows());
00060   assert(x.Ncols() == y.Ncols());
00061   Matrix m(x.Nrows(), x.Ncols());
00062   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < x.Nrows(); i++) {
00063     for(unsigned int j = 0; j < x.Ncols(); j++) {
00064       m.element(i,j) = x.element(i,j) * y.element(i,j);
00065     }
00066   }
00067   return m;
00068 }
00069 
00070 /** Utility printing function. */
00071 void printMatrix(Matrix &m, std::ostream *out, const std::string& delim) {
00072   int nRow = m.Nrows();
00073   int nCol = m.Ncols();
00074   int i = 0;
00075   int j = 0;
00076   if(out == NULL) 
00077     out = &cout;
00078 
00079   for(i = 0; i < nRow-1; i++) {
00080     for(j = 0; j < nCol - 1; j++) {
00081       (*out) << m.element(i,j) << delim;
00082     }
00083     (*out) << m.element(i,j) << delim;
00084   }
00085   for(j = 0; j < nCol - 1; j++) {
00086     (*out) << m.element(i,j) << delim;
00087   }
00088   (*out) << m.element(i,j);
00089 }
00090 
00091 std::string stringMatrix(Matrix &m, const std::string& delim)
00092 {
00093   std::ostringstream ostm;
00094   printMatrix(m,&ostm,delim);
00095   return ostm.str();
00096 }

00104 template <typename T1>
00105 void printVec_tmpl(const std::string& lbl,const std::string& fmt,const std::vector<T1> vec)
00106 {
00107   int s=vec.size();
00108   
00109   printf("%-15s(%4d):",lbl.c_str(),s);
00110   for (int i=0;i<s;i++) {
00111     //cout << vec[i];
00112     if (i!=0) {
00113       printf(",");
00114     }
00115     printf(fmt.c_str(),vec[i]);
00116   }
00117   printf("\n");
00118 }
00119 
00120 //
00121 void printVec(const std::string& lbl,const std::vector<char> vec)
00122 {
00123   printVec_tmpl(lbl,"%d",vec);
00124 }
00125 void printVec(const std::string& lbl,const std::vector<unsigned char> vec)
00126 {
00127   printVec_tmpl(lbl,"%d",vec);
00128 }
00129 void printVec(const std::string& lbl,const std::vector<int> vec)
00130 {
00131   printVec_tmpl(lbl,"%d",vec);
00132 }
00133 void printVec(const std::string& lbl,const std::vector<float> vec)
00134 {
00135   printVec_tmpl(lbl,"%.10f",vec);
00136 }
00137 void printVec(const std::string& lbl,const std::vector<double> vec)
00138 {
00139   printVec_tmpl(lbl,"%.12f",vec);
00140 }
